
module: Cisco-IOS-XE-switch-rpc
  augment /ios-xe-rpc:reload/ios-xe-rpc:input:
    +---w slot?   uint8

  rpcs:
    +---x switch
       +---w input
       |  +---w switch-number-drop-node-name    uint8
       |  +---w (pri-renum-stack)
       |     +--:(priority-case)
       |     |  +---w priority?                 uint8
       |     +--:(renumver-case)
       |     |  +---w renumber?                 uint8
       |     +--:(stack-case)
       |        +---w statck
       |           +---w port?   uint8
       +--ro output
          +--ro result?   string
